answers.answer: It's not testing how much junk you eat. It's testing your body's ability to process the sugars. If you do end up with gestational diabetes, your doctor will tell you how to keep it in control and you'll be fine. There's no reason to freak out. Talk with your doctor about your concerns and they can tell you better than we can how to deal with it all
